topic.title: : New Features Available in this Release

section.title: Multipath Boot from SAN
section.p:
includes support for multipath boot from SAN for FC and FCoE devices.
The supported FCoE device families are those from 650FLB family with an Emulex network processor (these present the FCoE LUNs directly into the node) and the 536FLB family with a QLogic/Broadcom network processor that present the LUNs as "native FCoE" to the operating system.

In order to allow use volumes from a SAN, a number of configuration options need to be specified for both the install phases and for the osconfig phases. In all cases the devices that are utilised are devices for which multipath is configured.
